scripts.netball-api-test: newman run tests/LSDivision.postman_collection.json -e AWSDEV.postman_environment.json --reporters cli,junit --reporter-junit-export newman.xml
scripts.netball-api-test1: newman run tests/LSBanner.postman_collection.json -e AWSDEV.postman_environment.json returnStatus: true --reporters cli,junit --reporter-junit-export newman.xml
